requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 and up
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 770 and up
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 and up
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 and up
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: RTX graphics card recommended for ray traced reflections
